div.p: SC regression coefficients of equatorial zonal winds for ( A) the multireanalysis mean of 20CR, ERA20, and NCEP, ( B) AMIP ensemble mean, ( C) SOLAR ensemble mean, and ( D) AMIP-ZM ensemble mean. Hatched areas indicate chance significance P < 0.1. Contour lines show the zonal wind climatology. Units in ms −1 per 1-W/m 2 increase in TSI. Signals refer to +1-y time lag. ( E and F) MSSA filtered equatorial zonal winds (ms −1) in the multireanalysis mean composite (1950–2010) and SOLAR, respectively, averaged over 800 hPa and 140°E–160°W (marked in A and C). TSI variability (gray, normalized) is superimposed for reference.
